title: Syndra bugs
body:
I'd like to report few bugs about Syndra after the latest patch:

* First is her floating/walking animation - it's like the skin Atlantean Syndra, affects Classic, Justicar,
* Recall animation bug;
* Death/corpse.

replies.body: Sorry for the wicked long wait/update. We're looking to (finally) have this solved for next patch!

Hey Liadrin! 

Thanks for the report! We're in the process of resolving these! We'd made some file size changes to her this patch, which resulted in this issue. D:
